description: fallen white horse harnessed to a wagon being assisted by a kneeling man seen from back at center; black horse unharnessed from same wagon, led by standing man at right; full wagon at left; men, women and children watching, at left and on sidewalk in middle ground center; cobblestone street
provenance: Pierre Chahine, son of the artist. [Armstrong Fine Art, Chicago, until 2010; sold in April for PROO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2010-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LLC, in pencil: [Edgar Chahine]; LRC, in pencil: [-le timonier Tombe - PARIS -]
title: The Helmsman Falls
